detailed_design.description: Design and implement 'Tinder for Files' interface for reviewing agent file organization suggestions. Users can approve/reject file moves with swipe gestures or buttons. Supports capability.sentinel from roadmap.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Design swipe-based review interface. 2. Implement file preview. 3. Add approve/reject actions. 4. Implement undo functionality. 5. Connect to sentinel backend API.

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to quickly review file organization suggestions.
As a user, I want to see file previews before approving moves.
As a user, I want to undo accidental approvals.

technical_notes.current_issue: No UI for sentinel review queue
